thread.title: UNWTO General Assembly in Medellin, Colombia, on its way
thread.title_full: UNWTO General Assembly in Medellin, Colombia, on its way

author: eTN Managing Editor
title: UNWTO General Assembly in Medellin, Colombia, on its way
text:
UNWTO General Assembly in Medellin, Colombia, on its way   
By Juergen Steinmetz, eTN Publisher | Sep 14, 2015 UNWTO General Assembly Delegates (Photo Credit: Christian del Rosario for eTN) eTN   
After delegates from around the globe enjoyed a spectacular Colombian performance and dinner at the welcome Ceremony Sunday night in Medellin, heads of delegation assembled on the big stage on Monday morning for a group photo before the arrival of the President of the Republic of Colombia, Juan Manuel Santos. The president is to officially open the general assembly. 
Christian del Rosario, attending the General Assembly with the eTN team covering the UNWTO event, took the group photo. Photo Credit Christian del Rosario attending with the eTN team 
The minister of tourism of Colombia Cecilia √Ålvarez and the major of Medellin r Gaviria Correa welcomed delegates Sunday night.
